welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ubungo, Tanzania! Get ready to experience the vibrant culture, warm hospitality, and bustling markets that this city is known for. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Ubungo has to offer. Karibu sana! (You are very welcome!)
